author: mbaessler
msg: PearInstaller UI was no longer able to call the CVD, change the way to call the CVD from PearInstaller UI.
CVD now called in a separate thread.

msg: HADOOP-2181. This issue adds logging for input splits in Jobtracker log and jobHistory log. Also adds web UI for viewing input splits in job UI and history UI. Contributed by Amareshwari Sriramadasu.
